verses.verse: <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> having been <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> with <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we have <S%G2192>obtained<s%> our <S%G4318>introduction<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> into <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2476>stand;<s%> and we <S%G2744>exult<s%> in <S%G1680>hope<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And not <S%G3440>only<s%> this, but we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2744>exult<s%> in our <S%G2347>tribulations,<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> <S%G2716>brings<s%> <S%G2716>about<s%> <S%G5281>perseverance;<s%>
and <S%G5281>perseverance,<s%> <S%G1382>proven<s%> <S%G1382>character;<s%> and <S%G1382>proven<s%> <S%G1382>character,<s%> <S%G1680>hope;<s%>

and <S%G1680>hope<s%> does not <S%G2617>disappoint,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has been <S%G7062>poured<s%> out <S%G1722>within<s%> our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> who was <S%G1325>given<s%> to us.
For while we were <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G772>helpless,<s%> at the <S%G2540>right<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> for the <S%G765>ungodly.<s%>

For <S%G5100>one<s%> will <S%G3433>hardly<s%> <S%G599>die<s%> for a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1342>man;<s%> <S%G1063>though<s%> <S%G5029>perhaps<s%> for the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>man<s%> <S%G5100>someone<s%> would <S%G5111>dare<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G599>die.<s%>

But <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4921>demonstrates<s%> His <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> us, in that while we were <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> for us.

<S%G4183>Much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G3767>then,<s%> having <S%G3568>now<s%> been <S%G1344>justified<s%> by His <S%G129>blood,<s%> we shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%> from the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> [of God] <S%G1223>through<s%> Him.

For <S%G1487>if<s%> while we were <S%G2190>enemies,<s%> we were <S%G2644>reconciled<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2288>death<s%> of His <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more,<s%> having been <S%G2644>reconciled,<s%> we shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%> by His <S%G2222>life.<s%>

And not <S%G3440>only<s%> this, but we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2744>exult<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G2643>reconciliation.<s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore,<s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G5618>just<s%> as <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> into the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> and <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1330>spread<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G1909>because<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G264>sinned<s%> â€“
for <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> was in the <S%G2889>world;<s%> but <S%G266>sin<s%> is not <S%G1677>imputed<s%> when there is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%>

<S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> from <S%G76>Adam<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who had not <S%G264>sinned<s%> in the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> of the <S%G3847>offense<s%> of <S%G76>Adam,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is a <S%G5179>type<s%> of Him who was to <S%G3195>come.<s%>

But the <S%G5486>free<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%> is not <S%G5613>like<s%> the <S%G3900>transgression.<s%> For <S%G1487>if<s%> by the <S%G3900>transgression<s%> of the <S%G1520>one<s%> the <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G599>died,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> did the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G1431>gift<s%> by the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>Man,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G4052>abound<s%> to the <S%G4183>many.<s%>

And the <S%G1434>gift<s%> is not <S%G5613>like<s%> [that which came] <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> who <S%G264>sinned;<s%> for on the <S%G3303>one<s%> <S%G3303>hand<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> [arose] from <S%G1520>one<s%> [transgression] <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in <S%G2631>condemnation,<s%> but on the <S%G1161>other<s%> <S%G1161>hand<s%> the <S%G5486>free<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%> [arose] from <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3900>transgressions<s%> <S%G1519>resulting<s%> in <S%G1345>justification.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> by the <S%G3900>transgression<s%> of the <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G4050>abundance<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> and of the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> will <S%G936>reign<s%> in <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1520>One,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> as <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3900>transgression<s%> there <S%G1519>resulted<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1345>act<s%> of <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> there <S%G1519>resulted<s%> <S%G1347>justification<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

For as <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> man's <S%G3876>disobedience<s%> the <S%G4183>many<s%> were <S%G2525>made<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of the <S%G1520>One<s%> the <S%G4183>many<s%> will be <S%G2525>made<s%> <S%G1342>righteous.<s%>

And the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G3922>came<s%> in that the <S%G3900>transgression<s%> might <S%G4121>increase;<s%> but <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G4121>increased,<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G5248>abounded<s%> <S%G5248>all<s%> the <S%G5248>more,<s%>

that, as <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> in <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> might <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> to <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
